description:
The gang is going out, but Yuka and Uc-chan can`t decide what to wear. So Chi-chan tries to order something that`ll pick an outfit for them, but he ends up summoning the famous high-charisma fashion designer from the underground, Chiteko!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chite Colle! Fashion Show Teko! Dechi!
Under Colle! It`s a Fashion Show, Teko!
チテコレ! ファッションショーてこ! でち!
